subject: Attn: Dear:
body:
Attn: Dear:
We the Money-Gram Board of Directors, We are contacting you regarding
your $9.5M USD which we have already program for immediate transfer to
you.
We have already made this (4) Ref-Number control number available on
your name to enable you pick up your payment but before we can be able
to release the complete information you have to obtain Authorization
Release Permit.
below is (4) Ref-Number control number available on your name:
Ref-Number: 4329-5547
Sender Name:.........
Amount: $5,000 USD
Ref-Number: 5643-8346
Sender Name:.........
Amount: $5,000 USD
Ref-Number: 2386-0063
Sender Name:.........
Amount: $5,000 USD
Ref-Number: 3316-6754
Sender Name:.........
Amount: $5,000 USD
What you are requested now is Authorization Release Permit, which is
going to cost you $50 USD (only)
 please be aware that this is the only
charges/fees, as soon this is done, your funds will be release to you
in less than 45Mins through Money-Gram.
Here is have to make the payment and wait to start picking up your
funds within 40 minutes time after you send the fee. you can send it
through iTunes card or steam wallet card
Waiting to receive the requested fee with your direct phone number.
Thanks for your understanding and Cooperation.
Best Regards,
Mr. Gabriel Mike
E-mail: 
moneygram2226@gmail.com
WhatsApp number +22953480690
Director Foreign Remittance

subject: Re: Attn: Dear:
body:
Hello Mr. Gabriel Mike,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message, although I must admit, it's a bit confusing. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, could you explain what this "Release Permit" is? I've never heard of such a thing before and would like to understand its purpose.

Secondly, you mentioned that there is a control number available on my name. Could you tell me more about this control number and how it relates to the transfer process?

Lastly, you mentioned that the only charges fees are in USD. Could you specify the exact amount? And why do I need to pay these fees?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions.

Best wishes,
Shawn

subject: Re: Attn: Dear:
body:
FROM THE DESK OF MR ALEX KELLY
MoneyGram International Inc. () 1550 Utica Avenue South,
MS 8020 Minneapolis, MN 55416 HOTLINE (+22953480690)
E-mail :website www.moneygram.com

Dear customer: ,

I have received your email in respect to your fund deposited here in my
department money gram post bank assign to be sending to you $1500 dollars
two times daily until your total fund of $15.7 million dollars is being
completed, your first payment is been programmed for your pick up as the
arrangement by the Federal Republic of Benin Government, Under the
co-operation of the new civilian Head of  State, President.

As it is now the only thing holding you from receiving the available for
pick up is $105.00 to stamp/sign  your payment file by  Financial Minister
Trust Funds  Federal Republic of Benin, this is instruction from the new
civilian Head of  State, President/ Minister of foreign payment's and that
is why your first payment is stop that you cannot receive it until
Financial Minister Trust Funds  Federal Republic of Benin stamp/sign.

All you have to do immediately when you receive this email is to copy the
payment information i have given you for the payment,  go to any nearest
money gram  and send the money please don't use western union to send money
to us use money gram.

Send the money with this information
Receivers name::: James Obie
Country:::::::::: Benin Republic
City::::::::::::: Cotonou
Amount::::::::::: $105
As soon as I confirm the following information from you, Your payment file
will be
sign and your available MTCN pin Numbers will be release for you to pick up
your first payment today.

THANKS; I AWAIT YOUR PROMPT RESPOND
BEST REGARDS TO YOU
MR ALEX KELLY
MANAGING DIRECTOR
MONEY GRAM DEPARTMENT
DIRECT LINE:(+22953480690) /
WEBSITE: WWW.MONEYGRAM.COM <http://www.moneygram.com/>
URGENT RESPOND NEEDED FROM YOU

subject: Re: Attn: Dear:
body:
Hello Mr. Alex Kelly,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information about the fund deposited in your department. It's quite interesting to know that there is a system in place to send me dollars two times daily until the total fund of million dollars is completed.

I'm curious, how does this process work? And why is it necessary for the Financial Minister Trust Funds Federal Republic of Benin to stamp sign my payment file? 

Also, I noticed you mentioned that I should use Money Gram instead of Western Union. Could you please explain why Money Gram is preferred?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shawn
